name: 林家正
objective:
對無機化合物之結構，化學性質等，利用量子化學，群論及結晶化學等加以探討。以配合天然礦物之形成，產狀，地球化學及環
境化學等學科之授課內容。
The chemical structure and properties of inorganic compounds, which are useful for the following courses: the forming and occurrence of minerals, earth and environmental chemistry, will be discussed by using quantum chemistry, group theory and crystallography.
schedule:
week 1 - 7: chapter 1-3 
(Atomic structure, molecular structure and bonding, the structures of simple solids) 
week 8 - 13: chapter 4-6
(Acids and bases, oxidation and reductions, molecular symmetry)
week 14-17: chapter 7-9
(an introduction to coordinate chemistry, physical techniques in inorganic chemistry, periodic trends)
materials: Shriver & Atkins’ Inorganic Chemistry – Weller, Overton, Rourke, and Armstrong, Armstrong; OXFORD; 6th edition
